name: Captain Blind (C64)
description:
Here's one from my collection of unlicensed superhero games. This one stars Captain Blind as he beat up plant things. The enemies and background colors changed as the levels progressed, but there isn't much more to it.

(No instructions)

Made with Gary Kitchen's Game Maker.

This game is in D64 format and is meant to be run in a Commodore 64 emulator
